about.title: About me
about.description: Graduate of a Masterâ€™s degree in Full-Stack Development Management at Efrei, I am passionate about web development and modern technologies. I completed 3 years of work-study at Storyzy, a company specialized in the fight against disinformation, where I contributed to projects such as interactive tutorials, front-end development with Angular, and back-end maintenance in Java.
about.search-for: I am currently looking for a full-time permanent position as a Full-Stack Developer, with the aim of contributing to meaningful projects in both the private sector and institutional environments such as police departments.
